page.title: 03Satterthwaite Post Office
page.content:
All the people in the village use the {Post Office.}The postmaster, Mr Ham, sells tobacco, sweets, souveniers, lollies, bread, papers, birthday cards and postcards. He also has pensions, family allowances, Girobank savings bank, National savings certificates and all post office work. He doesn't sell groceries, there is no need for them because there are travelling vans that bring all the groceries which are in demand.
There is a little pub in the village called the{Eagle's Head.}It has a small bar and is run by Mr Gill.It is popular with the villagers and it is also used a lot by holiday makers and tourists.
